A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While still mediocre\, this is a worthy addition to Star Wars. Many (if not all) characters remain interesting/intimidating\, the visuals are once again top notch\, and the music is once again a John Williams classic. Snoke is horribly written but well acted\, and Rey's training under Luke is the best part of the film. Rose\, while overall a waste of time\, is a much better character than many give her credit for\, and Phasma had potential to be a true villain. Meanwhile Hux is rendered idiotic and weak\, which is sad\, as I was looking forward to more of his powerfully worded evil speeches.
